original_text: For I have chosen him, so that he will direct his children and his household after him to keep the way of the Lord by doing what is right and just, so that the Lord will bring about for Abraham what he has promised him.”
korean_text: 내가 그로 그 자식과 권속에게 명하여 여호와의 도를 지켜 공의와 정의를 행하게 하려고 그를 택하였나니 이는 나 여호와가 아브라함에게 대하여 말한 일을 이루려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: so that he will direct his children
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 자녀들을 인도하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: to keep the way of the Lord
by doing what is right and just
so that the Lord will bring about
for Abraham what he has promised him
